p: The MIC determination was performed by modified broth microdilution assay as previously described [ 24]. For MBC evaluation, 10 μL of suspensions without visible growth were spotted on Skirrow agar plates surface and incubated for 72 h at 37 °C in microaerophilic conditions and 100% humidity conditions. The MBC was defined as the concentration that killed 99.9% of the initial inoculum.
